ygData.subject: Re: Lag Question?
ygData.msgSnippet: One other thing you might want to do is run dxdiag. gor to start run type dxdiag and hit enter. Select the sound tab. I found that full hardware acceleration
ygData.messageBody:
One other thing you might want to do is run
dxdiag. gor to start run type dxdiag and hit enter.
Select the sound tab. I found that full hardware
acceleration seriously bogged the game even before SoL. By
moving it back one setting I cleaned up a lot of lag. My
system is running a 256 chip and a 128 chip for ram. I
have a 64 meg video card and a crappy dial up that
rarely gets above 26400. I run full clip plane in Kunark
without a problem. However I have to almost completely
kill the clip plane to make Lagland
playable.<br><br>Timmye Cousteau
